headline: HCA Healthcare (HCA): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Since January 2021, the S&P 500 has delivered a total return of 82.8%. But one standout stock has more than doubled the market - over the past five years, HCA Healthcare has surged 183% to $470.79 per share. Its momentum hasn’t stopped as it’s also gained 29.1% in the last six months thanks to its solid quarterly results, beating the S&P by 19%.
